agents.name: Aesthetic Critic
agents.description: Reviews UI styling changes against the project's design system for visual consistency and dark mode correctness

agents.name: Ansible Critic
agents.description: Reviews Ansible roles and playbooks for idempotency, security, and best practices

agents.name: Api Critic
agents.description: Reviews API design for usability — confusing endpoints, inconsistent conventions, missing pagination, poor error responses

agents.name: Aws Dev
agents.description: Implements CloudFormation infrastructure tasks

agents.name: Backend Aws Critic
agents.description: Reviews code calling AWS services for unhandled failure modes, missing permissions, and SDK misuse

agents.name: Backend Critic Go
agents.description: Reviews backend Go code for API design, concurrency, error handling, and best practices (Gin, Lambda)

agents.name: Backend Critic Java
agents.description: Reviews backend Java code for API design, concurrency, error handling, and best practices (Netty, Lambda)

agents.name: Backend Critic Ts
agents.description: Reviews backend TypeScript code for API design, async patterns, error handling, and best practices (Express, Lambda)

agents.name: Builder
agents.description: Builds features from PRDs or ad-hoc requests by orchestrating implementation agents

agents.name: Cloudformation Critic
agents.description: Reviews CloudFormation templates for security, best practices, and operational safety

agents.name: Coder
agents.description: Default interactive coding assistant

agents.name: Comment Critic
agents.description: Reviews comments and removes noise — flags obvious comments that just restate the code

agents.name: Copy Critic
agents.description: Reviews marketing copy for clarity, target market fit, feature accuracy, and brand voice consistency

agents.name: Critic
agents.description: Routes code review to the appropriate specialist critic(s) based on file types and content

agents.name: Debugger
agents.description: Investigates production issues by pulling ticket context, searching logs, and identifying likely defect areas

agents.name: Developer
agents.description: Implements one task how the project wants

agents.name: Docker Dev
agents.description: Implements Docker image and container configuration tasks

agents.name: Docs Writer
agents.description: Creates and updates support documentation for user-facing features

agents.name: Dx Critic
agents.description: Reviews exported/public package APIs for testability, consistency, and developer experience

agents.name: E2e Playwright
agents.description: Writes Playwright E2E tests for identified UI areas

agents.name: E2e Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews UI changes and identifies all modified areas for E2E testing

agents.name: Exploit Critic
agents.description: Adversarial review that attempts to exploit code — finds injection, auth bypass, privilege escalation, and data exfiltration paths

agents.name: Felix
agents.description: Watches a PR for feedback and build failures.

agents.name: Frontend Critic
agents.description: Reviews frontend code for component design, performance, styling, and best practices

agents.name: Go Dev
agents.description: Implements Go tasks specializing in web services and AWS interactions

agents.name: Go Tester
agents.description: Writes Go tests using testify and httptest for comprehensive test coverage

agents.name: Hammer
agents.description: Implements one task to fix issues with pull requests

agents.name: Handoff Contract Critic
agents.description: Checks builder/planner/toolkit routing contracts for ownership contradictions and scope drift

agents.name: Java Dev
agents.description: Implements Java tasks specializing in Netty and low-level networking

agents.name: Jest Tester
agents.description: Writes backend Jest tests in TypeScript for comprehensive test coverage

agents.name: Merge Coordinator
agents.description: Processes the merge queue - rebases, tests, and merges PRs from parallel sessions

agents.name: Network Critic
agents.description: Reviews code making network requests for resilience, blocking behavior, and lock-during-IO problems

agents.name: Oddball Critic
agents.description: Reviews code for consistency with the existing codebase — flags patterns that look different from established conventions

agents.name: Overlord
agents.description: Implements one task how the project wants

agents.name: Planner
agents.description: Refine draft PRDs and prepare them for implementation

agents.name: Playwright Dev
agents.description: Implements Playwright test automation tasks

agents.name: Policy Testability Critic
agents.description: Flags non-testable MUST/CRITICAL/NEVER rules and suggests enforceable rewrites

agents.name: Prd
agents.description: Augments a ticket with a dev plan

agents.name: Prd Impact Analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes impact of completed PRDs on other PRDs in the backlog

agents.name: Prompt Critic
agents.description: Reviews AI agent prompts, MCP server definitions, and tool configurations for clarity, ambiguity, and failure modes

agents.name: Public Page Critic
agents.description: Reviews public-facing pages for conversion optimization, accessibility, mobile UX, and brand consistency

agents.name: Public Page Dev
agents.description: Implements public-facing pages (marketing, legal, error) following brand guidelines and conversion best practices

agents.name: Python Dev
agents.description: Implements Python tasks specializing in LangChain and AI/ML pipelines

agents.name: Qa
agents.description: Coordinates QA testing by dispatching explorer and browser-tester subagents

agents.name: Qa Browser Tester
agents.description: Writes Playwright tests for QA findings by inspecting pages and delegating to playwright-dev

agents.name: Qa Explorer
agents.description: Explores web applications to find bugs through adversarial testing

agents.name: Quality Critic
agents.description: Reviews UI for quality beyond correctness — visual regression, CLS, accessibility, and performance

agents.name: React Dev
agents.description: Implements React tasks specializing in UI consistency, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript

agents.name: React Tester
agents.description: Writes Jest tests for React components using React Testing Library and TypeScript

agents.name: Requirements Critic
agents.description: Reviews code for decisions that will complicate or conflict with implementing remaining requirements

agents.name: Screenshot Maintainer
agents.description: Maintains product screenshots used in marketing pages and support articles, auto-updating when UI changes

agents.name: Security Critic
agents.description: Reviews code for security scan findings — CSP, CORS, XSRF, SSRF, dependency CVEs, and compliance issues

agents.name: Semantic Critic
agents.description: Reviews diagrams, flows, and sequential content for logical coherence between visual and textual elements

agents.name: Seo Critic
agents.description: Reviews public pages for SEO - meta tags, headings, structured data, page speed, and search engine best practices

agents.name: Session Status
agents.description: Display session status dashboard with conflict analysis

agents.name: Support Article Writer
agents.description: Writes and updates support articles with screenshots for product documentation

agents.name: Tailwind Critic
agents.description: Reviews Tailwind CSS usage for project-specific design system patterns and dark mode conventions

agents.name: Terraform Dev
agents.description: Implements Terraform infrastructure tasks

agents.name: Tester
agents.description: Orchestrates test writing by routing to specialist testing agents

agents.name: Toolkit
agents.description: Maintains the AI toolkit - agents, skills, templates, and scaffolds

agents.name: Tools Writer
agents.description: Creates and updates AI agent tools when features change

agents.name: Update Schema Critic
agents.description: Validates project-updates file structure, required frontmatter, and required workflow sections

agents.name: Wall E
agents.description: Cleans up a workspace

agents.name: Workflow Enforcement Critic
agents.description: Verifies mandatory toolkit post-change workflow artifacts and completion reporting

skills.name: Adhoc Workflow
skills.description: Ad-hoc mode workflow for Builder. Use when handling direct requests without a PRD, quick fixes, or one-off tasks. Triggers on: ad-hoc mode, quick fix, direct request, one-off task.

skills.name: Agent Audit
skills.description: Audit AI toolkit agents for compliance and coverage gaps. Use when you need to check if agents follow conventions, or find missing agents for a project's stack. Triggers on: audit agents, agent compliance, toolkit gaps, missing agents, stack coverage.

skills.name: Agent Onboard
skills.description: No description provided

skills.name: Ai Tools Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific AI tools skill. Use when a project has ai: true and aiTools configuration. Triggers on: generate ai tools skill, create chatbot tools, ai-tools-skill-generator.

skills.name: Api Endpoint Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific API patterns skill. Use when a project has api: true to document endpoint creation patterns. Triggers on: generate api skill, create endpoint patterns, api-endpoint-skill-generator.

skills.name: Auth Generic
skills.description: Generic/custom authentication implementation for any provider. Use when project uses custom auth or unsupported provider. Triggers on: custom auth, generic login, auth-generic.

skills.name: Auth Headless
skills.description: Headless authentication using API calls and session injection. Skips UI login for faster tests. Triggers on: headless auth, skip login ui, inject session, auth-headless.

skills.name: Auth Nextauth Credentials
skills.description: NextAuth credentials (email/password) authentication for AI agents. Triggers on: nextauth login, nextauth credentials, auth-nextauth-credentials.

skills.name: Auth Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific auth-flow skill. Use when a project has authentication: true but no auth-flow skill. Triggers on: generate auth skill, create auth patterns, auth-skill-generator.

skills.name: Auth Supabase Otp
skills.description: Supabase passwordless OTP authentication for AI agents. Handles magic link and email code flows. Triggers on: supabase otp, supabase magic link, auth-supabase-otp.

skills.name: Auth Supabase Password
skills.description: Supabase email/password authentication for AI agents. Triggers on: supabase password, supabase email login, auth-supabase-password.

skills.name: Browser Debugging
skills.description: Browser debugging escalation protocol for when tests pass but the feature doesn't work in the user's browser. Triggers on: tests pass but doesn't work, feature broken in browser, works in playwright but not browser, console screenshot, browser debugging.
triggers: works in playwright but not browser

skills.name: Builder State
skills.description: Manage builder session state for resumability. Use when reading/writing builder-state.json, updating heartbeat, or resuming sessions. Triggers on: session state, builder state, heartbeat, resume session.

skills.name: Crud Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific CRUD patterns skill. Use for any project with a database to document entity creation patterns. Triggers on: generate crud skill, create crud patterns, crud-skill-generator.

skills.name: Cve
skills.description: Assess a CVE for exposure, exploitability, and remediation options across one or more repositories.

skills.name: Database Migration Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific database migration skill. Use for any project with a database to document migration patterns. Triggers on: generate migration skill, create migration patterns, database-migration-skill-generator.

skills.name: E2e Quality
skills.description: Quality-beyond-correctness E2E testing patterns. Catches visual glitches, performance issues, layout shifts, and intermediate bad states. Triggers on: flicker test, visual stability, performance budget, negative assertion, CLS test, drag drop test, animation test.

skills.name: Email Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific transactional email skill. Use when a project has email: true or email integration (resend, sendgrid, etc). Triggers on: generate email skill, create email patterns, email-skill-generator.

skills.name: Form Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific form patterns skill. Use for frontend apps to document form handling. Triggers on: generate form skill, create form patterns, form-skill-generator.

skills.name: Git Sync
skills.description: Team synchronization for multi-machine collaboration. Provides pull/push protocols for keeping repos in sync across team members. Triggers on: team sync, git sync, pull latest, push changes.

skills.name: Marketing Copy
skills.description: Generate marketing copy from product documentation and PRDs. Use when you need to write headlines, value propositions, feature descriptions, CTAs, or other marketing text derived from the product. Triggers on: write marketing copy, generate headlines, create tagline, feature benefits, value proposition.

skills.name: Merge Conflicts
skills.description: Resolve merge conflicts on a pull request by merging the target branch into the source branch and fixing conflicts. Use when a PR has merge conflicts, a branch needs to be updated, or when asked to fix conflicts. Triggers on: fix merge conflicts, resolve conflicts, merge conflicts on PR, update branch, rebase PR.

skills.name: Multi Session
skills.description: Multi-session coordination for parallel AI sessions. Provides session locks, heartbeat, and merge queue management. Only active when agents.multiSession: true in project.json.

skills.name: Multi Tenant Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific tenant-context skill. Use when a project has multiTenant: true but no tenant-context skill. Triggers on: generate tenant skill, create multi-tenant patterns, multi-tenant-skill-generator.

skills.name: Post Completion
skills.description: Post-completion polish steps for Developer. Use when all PRD stories pass but before declaring COMPLETE. Triggers on: post-completion, polish, aesthetic review, support articles, final checks.

skills.name: Prd
skills.description: Generate a Product Requirements Document (PRD) for a new feature. Use when planning a feature, starting a new project, or when asked to create a PRD. Triggers on: create a prd, write prd for, plan this feature, requirements for, spec out.

skills.name: Prd To Json
skills.description: Convert PRDs to prd.json format for the Developer autonomous agent system. Use when you have an existing PRD and need to convert it to Developer's JSON format. Triggers on: convert this prd, turn this into developer format, create prd.json from this, developer json.

skills.name: Prd Workflow
skills.description: PRD mode workflow for Builder. Use when building features from PRDs, implementing user stories, or managing PRD state transitions. Triggers on: PRD mode, build PRD, implement stories, ship PRD.

skills.name: Product Screenshots
skills.description: Capture and maintain product screenshots for marketing and support use. Use when you need to capture UI screenshots, refresh outdated screenshots, or check if screenshots need updating after UI changes. Triggers on: capture screenshots, update product images, refresh screenshots, screenshot the feature, marketing screenshots.

skills.name: Project Bootstrap
skills.description: Bootstrap a new or existing project with stack detection and project.json generation. Use when adding a new project, setting up agent system, or generating project manifest. Triggers on: add project, new project, bootstrap project, setup project, detect stack.

skills.name: Project Scaffold
skills.description: Generate project boilerplate from scaffold templates. Use when creating a new project after stack selection. Triggers on: scaffold project, generate boilerplate, create from template.

skills.name: Public Page
skills.description: Generate public-facing pages (marketing, legal, error, changelog). Use when building landing pages, feature pages, pricing pages, terms of service, 404/500 pages, or changelogs. Triggers on: create landing page, build pricing page, new feature page, create 404 page, terms of service, changelog page.

skills.name: Screenshot
skills.description: Capture authenticated screenshots of web pages for visual verification. Use when you need to see rendered UI, verify dark mode styling, or check visual changes. Triggers on: take screenshot, capture screenshot, show me the page, visual check, verify styling.

skills.name: Setup Auth
skills.description: Interactive authentication configuration for AI agents. Scans codebase for auth providers, walks through configuration options, and writes to project.json. Triggers on: setup auth, configure authentication, /setup-auth, auth config.

skills.name: Spec Analyzer
skills.description: No description provided

skills.name: Stack Advisor
skills.description: No description provided

skills.name: Start Dev Server
skills.description: Start the development server for a project and wait for it to be ready. Use when you need to run the dev server for building, testing, or verification. Triggers on: start dev server, start server, run dev, npm run dev, start development server.

skills.name: Stripe Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific payments skill for Stripe integration. Use when a project has stripe in integrations. Triggers on: generate stripe skill, create payment patterns, stripe-skill-generator.

skills.name: Table Skill Generator
skills.description: Generate a project-specific data table patterns skill. Use for frontend apps to document table/list handling. Triggers on: generate table skill, create table patterns, table-skill-generator.

skills.name: Test Flow
skills.description: Automatic test generation and execution flows for Builder. Use when generating unit/E2E tests, handling test failures, or managing E2E deferral. Triggers on: generate tests, run tests, test failures, E2E deferral, test flow.

skills.name: Test User Cleanup
skills.description: Clean up dynamically created test users from the database. Prevents test user accumulation. Triggers on: cleanup test users, delete test accounts, test-user-cleanup.
